objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalSplit' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='49%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='51%' stop-color='#FFCCD5'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFCCD5'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalSplit)'/><g fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.2'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='180' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='260' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='100' cy='180' r='3'/><circle cx='180' cy='180' r='3'/><circle cx='260' cy='180' r='3'/><circle cx='820' cy='820' r='3'/><circle cx='900' cy='820' r='3'/><circle cx='980' cy='820' r='3'/><circle cx='820' cy='900' r='3'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='3'/><circle cx='980' cy='900' r='3'/></g><path d='M-100 200L300 -100L500 -50L100 300Z' fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.1'/><path d='M1180 880L780 1180L580 1130L980 780Z' fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.1'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='30' fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.1'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='30' fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.1'/><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#FF9AAD' stroke-width='2' opacity='.1'/><g transform='rotate(45 540 540)'><rect x='100' y='100' width='20' height='200' fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.1'/><rect x='960' y='780' width='20' height='200' fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.1'/></g><g fill='#FF9AAD' opacity='.15'><path d='M200 200 L210 230 L240 240 L210 250 L200 280 L190 250 L160 240 L190 230 Z'/><path d='M880 160 L890 190 L920 200 L890 210 L880 240 L870 210 L840 200 L870 190 Z'/><path d='M160 880 L170 910 L200 920 L170 930 L160 960 L150 930 L120 920 L150 910 Z'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✓ Premium Canvas Material
✓ Multiple Organizer Pockets
✓ Self-Standing Structure
✓ Adjustable Shoulder Strap

product_details.description: 💗【Original Designed Brand】Original designed brand,exquisite production technology,thickened canvas material,large capacity multi-pocket practical.Strong structure can hold over 40 pounds,can stand by itself own.Reject cheap and low-quality malicious imitation. 💗【Mutil Pockets】The canvas tote bag with 2 front pockets can put cellphone,Watter bottle,keys,and wallet convenient access at any time,1 big pockets behind the bag can put ipad to pass the time when bored. 💗【Structured Bag】The purse can upright on by itself own,easy to place on the desktop or floor at any time and keep the contents of the bag from spilling.Use thick quality canvas, strong and rugged. 💗【Large Capacity】Square design,high space utilization,suitable for books and documents,in addition to everyday use,it is also suitable for work and college.can used as laptop computer teacher work nurse travel beach gym gift book bag. 💗【Removable and Adjustable Shoulder Strap】The crossbody messenger bag with removable and adjustable shoulder strap,handbag tote bag also crossbody bag. 💗【Magnetic Closure】The women purses and handbags designed with magnetic closure,easy to take things from inside the bag and put things,but also can help to protect privacy and prevent theft. Fabric type - Canvas ** Care instructions - Machine Wash ** Origin - Imported ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and stylish product advertisement for a canvas tote bag. It uses a diagonal gradient split background transitioning from white to a soft pink, accentuated with semi-transparent geometric elements and decorative stars to add depth and elegance. The top-left section showcases a bold headline (`heading`) and a subheadline (`tagline`) to capture attention. Below them, a feature list (`description`) outlines the tote's key benefits using check marks. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed on the right side, giving the banner a strong visual anchor. At the bottom-left, a large price tag (`price`) stands out in bold typography, and a call-to-action button features contrasting white text (`cta`) on a pink rectangular block (`cta_background`), encouraging immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFCCD5`
- Deep Pink: `#E75480`
- Bright Pink: `#FF6B88`
- Charcoal: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color:
The product image showcases a canvas tote bag dominated by a soft pastel pink color, giving it a feminine, stylish, and gentle appeal. The monochromatic theme is harmoniously applied throughout the bag — from the fabric body to the straps, pockets, and even the stitched branding, creating a cohesive visual experience. Subtle shadows and lighting variations delicately highlight stitched edges and textured fabric, offering depth while maintaining a smooth blend. The metal button and clip accents in silver add a modern, complementary contrast without overpowering the main color. Suggested color palette includes:  
- Soft Pink: #F4AEB3  
- Blush Pink: #F7C5CD  
- Rose Quartz: #EBC8D0  
- Light Gray (metal accents): #C0C0C0  
- White (for text/contrast): #FFFFFF
